sysevent_email_action.message_html:
Subject: Update on Your Order Request

Dear ${requested_for},

We regret to inform you that your order request could not be approved.

Order Details:

  • Order ID: ${number}
  • Package Description: ${cat_item.description}
  • Submission Date: ${sys_updated_on}

Reason for Rejection:

Thank you for choosing ExploreNow for your travel plans. After reviewing your order request, we regret to inform you that it could not be approved due to the following reason:

The selected package, '[Package Name],' is currently unavailable for the dates you requested. This could be due to high demand, limited availability, or restrictions from our travel partners for the specified destination during that period.

We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused. We recommend exploring alternative packages or adjusting your travel dates to accommodate availability. If you'd like assistance in finding another package or customizing a similar one, our support team is here to help.

Please feel free to contact us at [Support Email] or call us at [Contact Number]. We value your interest and hope to assist you with your travel plans soon."

This explanation provides clarity, shows empathy, and offers actionable next steps to keep the user engaged.

We apologize for the inconvenience and encourage you to explore other packages or make adjustments to your request. For assistance, please contact our support team at explorenow@example.com.

Thank you for your understanding, and we hope to assist you in planning your perfect trip soon.

Warm regards,
The ExploreNow Team
explorenow@example.com
sysevent_email_action.name: ExploreNow TE3
